About Us

This website is created as part of an internship task to learn and apply Bootstrap 5 for building responsive and modern web interfaces. The focus of this project is on understanding layout structure, reusable components, and clean UI design practices.

Our Purpose

To explore Bootstrap UI components and responsive layouts.

Technologies Used

HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap ver5, Java Script, GitHub.

Learning Outcome

Gained hands-on experience in modern web UI development.
